project_abstract.cdata: The project would involve: improvement or construction of: (a) Damascus-Lebanese border highway (b) Damascus-Jordanian border highway, and (c) Tall Kalakh detour on the Homs-Tartous highway (ii) technical assistance consisting in consultants' services for: (a) supervision of above works, (b) preparation of feasibility studies and, if justified, detailed engineering for about 540 km of further road work, and (c) bringing up to date a study on road maintenance needs.
